scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist/styles && cleancss -o dist/styles/base.min.css styles/base.css && cleancss -o dist/styles/home.min.css styles/home.css && cleancss -o dist/styles/projects.min.css styles/projects.css && cleancss -o dist/styles/research.min.css styles/research.css && cleancss -o dist/styles/cv.min.css styles/cv.css
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist/js && terser js/main.js js/core.js js/carousel.js js/modal.js js/parallax.js js/research-detail.js --module --compress --mangle --output dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:images && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.deploy:pages: CFP="${CF_PAGES_PROJECT:-$PROJECT}"; test -n "$CFP" || (echo 'CF_PAGES_PROJECT (or PROJECT) is required' && exit 1); npx wrangler pages deploy .deploy/public --project-name "$CFP" --branch main --commit-dirty=true
scripts.publish: npm run mirror:externals && npm run stage:pages && npm run check:local && npm run deploy:pages && npm run check:remote
